name: Star Trek: Killer Q'egh
description:
Controls:Arrow keys - Move
Z or C - Jump
X or V - Attack

Also supports certain USB gamepads via SDL. Give yours a try!

Play as Lieutenant Worf while he faces his most dangerous enemy! Run, jump, and slide to keep your spine intact. It's barrels of fun! Q'apla!

A totally free, non-commercial, parody fan game based on the events of the Star Trek: The Next Generation episode, "Ethics". All characters, trademarks, music, and other intellectual property rights belong to their respective owners.

If playing on a mobile device, try disabling the pinch/zoom feature of your web browser first, if possible. Sound effects or the game itself may lag on low-power devices in the web-based versions. If you experience these or other issues, try downloading the binary for your operating system and play it on your computer.

If you like this game, please try Killer Kegs, with all the same action plus totally original graphics and sounds.

Thanks for playing my very first video game! Made with love and Pico-8.
